```{r}

# Loading dataset

qp_data_raw_1 <- read_excel("~/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/rutgers/phd/second_year/QP/paper/RESULTS/data/qp_data_raw_1.xls")

View(qp_data_raw_1)

qp_data <- qp_data_raw_1[-(100:126),]

qp_data$age<-as.numeric(qp_data$age)

summary(qp_data$age)

qp_data$age_arrive_in_Spain<-as.numeric(qp_data$age_arrive_in_Spain)

qp_data$political_orientation <- factor(qp_data$political_orientation, levels = c("Far left", "Left", "Center-Left", "Centre", "Center-Right", "Right"))

qp_data$mother_tongue <- factor(qp_data$mother_tongue, levels = c("Catalan", "Both", "Spanish", "Other(s)"))

```


```{r}
mod_null_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1, data = qp_data)

mod_1_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1 + political_orientation, data = qp_data)

mod_2_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1 + political_orientation + gender, data = qp_data)

mod_3_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1 + political_orientation + gender + age, data = qp_data)

mod_4_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1 + political_orientation + gender + age + level_of_education, data = qp_data)

mod_5_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1 + political_orientation + gender + age + level_of_education + employment, data = qp_data)

mod_6_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1 + political_orientation + gender + age + level_of_education + employment + family_income, data = qp_data)

mod_7_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1 + political_orientation + gender + age + level_of_education + employment + family_income + mother_tongue, data = qp_data)

mod_int_lang_identity_1 <- lm(Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands ~ 1, political_orientation:gender:age:level_of_education:employment:family_income:mother_tongue, data = qp_data)

plot(mod_2_lang_identity_1)


summary(mod_1_lang_identity_1)

summary(mod_int_lang_identity)

summary(mod_2_lang_identity_1)

summary(mod_3_lang_identity_1)

summary(mod_4_lang_identity_1)

summary(mod_5_lang_identity_1)

summary(mod_6_lang_identity_1)

summary(mod_7_lang_identity_1)


anova(mod_null_lang_identity_1,mod_1_lang_identity_1, mod_2_lang_identity_1, mod_3_lang_identity_1, mod_4_lang_identity_1, mod_5_lang_identity_1, mod_6_lang_identity_1, mod_7_lang_identity_1)

ggplot(
  data = qp_data, 
  aes(
    x = political_orientation,
    y = Catalan_is_an_identity_element_of_the_Balearic_Islands, 
    fill = political_orientation)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = mean_se, geom = "pointrange", pch = 23, size = 1) +
  labs(x = "Political orientation", y = "Catalan is an identity element of the Balearic Islands", fill = "Political Orientation") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("indianred2", "indianred2", "indianred2", "cornflowerblue", "cornflowerblue", "cornflowerblue")) +
  theme(
    legend.key.size = unit(1, "lines"),  
    legend.key.width = unit(1.5, "lines"),  
    legend.spacing.x = unit(0.5, "lines")  
  ) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size = 0.5)))

```
